title: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (16 GB) – Our fastest Kindle ever, with new 7" glare-free display, and weeks of battery life – Black
raw_desc: Our fastest Kindle ever – The next-generation 7“ Paperwhite display has a higher contrast ratio and 25% faster page turns. Ready for travel – The ultra-thin design has a larger glare-free screen so pages stay sharp no matter where you are. Escape into your books – Your Kindle doesn’t have social media, notifications, or other distracting apps. Battery life for your longest novel – A single charge via USB-C lasts up to 12 weeks. Read in any light – Adjust the display from white to amber to read in bright sunlight or in the dark.
features: Our fastest Kindle ever – The next-generation 7“ Paperwhite display has a higher contrast ratio and 25% faster page turns.
Ready for travel – The ultra-thin design has a larger glare-free screen so pages stay sharp no matter where you are.
Escape into your books – Your Kindle doesn’t have social media, notifications, or other distracting apps.
Battery life for your longest novel – A single charge via USB-C lasts up to 12 weeks.
Read in any light – Adjust the display from white to amber to read in bright sunlight or in the dark.
